## Project: Vercel API Server for Nesine Scraper

- **Type**: Python API server
- **Platform**: Vercel serverless functions
- **Purpose**: Scrape Nesine.com data and serve via API to GitHub Pages client
- **Features**: CORS enabled, Python scraping logic, CSV data processing
